question: Who has become the youngest Indian woman to win on Ladies European Tour (LET)?
explanation: Diksha Dagar, an Indian female professional deaf golfer, has created history by becoming the youngest Indian woman to win on the Ladies European Tour (LET) at the age of 18  as she won the 2019 Investec South African Women\'s Open in Cape Town on 16th March. She also became the 2nd Indian woman golfer to win a title after Aditi Ashok.
